name: create-hydrogen CLI cannot run non-interactively
description: The npx create-hydrogen@latest CLI always requires interactive prompts (store selection, template choice, styling) and throws 'Failed to prompt' errors in non-interactive environments like CI or piped processes. Fix: manually scaffold the Hydrogen app by creating files based on the official skeleton template from the Hydrogen GitHub repo.

trigger.errorPattern: Failed to prompt.*This usually happens when running a command non-interactively
trigger.errorMessage: create-hydrogen requires interactive terminal for store selection and template configuration

steps.description: Manually create the Hydrogen app directory structure with files from the official skeleton template: package.json, vite.config.ts, tsconfig.json, server.ts, react-router.config.ts, env.d.ts, .graphqlrc.ts, and app/ directory with root.tsx, entry.server.tsx, entry.client.tsx, routes.ts, lib/context.ts, lib/session.ts, lib/fragments.ts, styles/app.css, styles/reset.css
Install dependencies from the manually created package.json
